titleStmt.title: A sermon preached for the funeral of that humble and faithful servant of Jesus Christ, Mr. Nathanael Smith late of Malmesbury, in the county of Wilts. : with a brief account of his life, in an epistle to Dr. Annesley / by Henry Chandler ...
titleStmt.author: Chandler, Henry.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
